name: api_core_RectTransform
description: Position, size, anchor and pivot information for a rectangle.

properties.name: anchoredPosition
properties.description: The position of the pivot of this RectTransform relative to the anchor reference point.

properties.name: anchoredPosition3D
properties.description: The 3D position of the pivot of this RectTransform relative to the anchor reference point.

properties.name: anchorMax
properties.description: The normalized position in the parent RectTransform that the upper right corner is anchored to.

properties.name: anchorMin
properties.description: The normalized position in the parent RectTransform that the lower left corner is anchored to.

properties.name: drivenByObject
properties.description: The object that is driving the values of this RectTransform. Value is null if not driven.

properties.name: offsetMax
properties.description: The offset of the upper right corner of the rectangle relative to the upper right anchor.

properties.name: offsetMin
properties.description: The offset of the lower left corner of the rectangle relative to the lower left anchor.

properties.name: pivot
properties.description: The normalized position in this RectTransform that it rotates around.

properties.name: rect
properties.description: The calculated rectangle in the local space of the Transform.

properties.name: sendChildDimensionsChange
properties.description: Whether the RectTransform notifies components when a child RectTransform changes dimensions.

properties.name: sizeDelta
properties.description: The size of this RectTransform relative to the distances between the anchors.

properties.name: ForceUpdateRectTransforms
properties.description: Force the recalculation of RectTransforms internal data.

properties.name: GetLocalCorners
properties.description: Get the corners of the calculated rectangle in the local space of its Transform.

properties.name: GetWorldCorners
properties.description: Get the corners of the calculated rectangle in world space.

properties.name: SetInsetAndSizeFromParentEdge
properties.description: Set the distance of this rectangle relative to a specified edge of the parent rectangle, while also setting its size.

properties.name: SetSizeWithCurrentAnchors
properties.description: Makes the RectTransform calculated rect be a given size on the specified axis.

properties.name: Destroy
properties.description: Removes a GameObject, component, or asset.

properties.name: DestroyImmediate
properties.description: Destroys the specified object immediately. Use with caution and in Edit mode only.

properties.name: DontDestroyOnLoad
properties.description: Do not destroy the target Object when loading a new Scene.

properties.name: FindAnyObjectByType
properties.description: Retrieves any active loaded object of Type type.
